remarks: Condition implying a lattice plane.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2012.)
statement:
lplnset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lplnset.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lplnset.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
lplnset.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
lplni $p |- ( ( ( K e. D /\ Y e. B /\ X e. N ) /\ X C Y ) -> Y e. P ) $.
